verbose_text: The finding that plant extracts are able to inhibit IL-12 and IL-1beta, has previously been demonstrated by Verma et al 4 who were able to show that extracts of Grindelia robusta and Quassia amara significantly inhibit IL-12 and IL-1beta in LPS induced murine macrophage cell lines by 50%.
evidence: plant extracts are able to inhibit IL-12 and IL-1beta
